attributes.action: Keep grassroots football training going throughout the current lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Please for the health, mentally and socially keep grassroots football training on during the lockdown with the current COVID secure measures in place. Children made to be at school within a classroom indoors of 30+ each day. At football training children are in smaller groups & outdoors. They need to keep some normality in their lives. Let them have fun in a secure environment, keeping safe. Do not punish them anymore with taking this freedom away if it’s done in a safe and secure environment.
attributes.background: Enable grassroots football training to keep going in an already COVID secure way, within lockdown commencing on 05/11/20

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169

Allow outdoor amateur football to continue during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557467
